title: Multi-chain EVM Wallet Drain
summary: Hundreds of wallets being drained on various EVM chains for small amounts (<$2k total per victim). Root cause not yet identified. Total ~$107K drained with theft total still increasing.

title: Trust Wallet Extension Drain
summary: Multiple Trust Wallet users reported funds drained within hours. Coincidentally the Trust Wallet Chrome extension pushed a new update yesterday. Possible supply chain attack or malicious update.

title: Private Key Compromise - 5 Wallets
summary: Victim had suspicious outflows of ~$1.1M from five wallets on EVM chains. Attacker swapped all assets for ETH immediately and deposited 330 ETH to Tornado Cash.

title: Danny/Meech Genesis Creditor Theft
summary: British threat actor Danny/Meech (Danish Zulfiqar Khan) likely arrested. $18.58M seized. Involved in $243M Genesis Creditor theft and Kroll SIM Swap compromising BlockFi/Genesis/FTX creditors leading to $300M+ stolen.
notes: Villa raided in Dubai - multiple arrests

title: GANA Payment Protocol Exploit
summary: GANA Payment exploited for ~$3.1M+ on BSC. Attacker deposited 1140 BNB ($1.04M) to Tornado on BSC and bridged to Ethereum. 346.8 ETH ($1.05M) deposited to Tornado. 346 ETH ($1.046M) sits dormant.
notes: Funds split between Tornado deposits and dormant wallet

title: Fake Hyperliquid App Scam
summary: Fake Hyperliquid app on Google Play Store stealing user funds. Platforms not filtering scam apps effectively.

title: Garden Finance Exploit
summary: Garden Finance exploited for $10.8M+ on multiple chains. Team sent onchain message offering 10% whitehat bounty. All freezeable assets quickly swapped. Ironic given 25%+ of Garden Finance activity related to stolen funds.
notes: Team offered 10% bounty - no public comment yet

title: Hypurr NFT Drain
summary: Threat actor drained 8 Hypurr NFTs airdropped to compromised wallets on HyperEVM profiting ~$400K.
